articles.author: Marita Moloney
articles.title: Ireland weather: Met Eireann forecast as 'intense' heat set to bake some parts of Europe - Irish Mirror
articles.description: This Mediterranean heatwave could extend into the middle of August and Met Eireann has hinted Ireland could benefit from some of the warm weather
articles.content:
Met Eireann has indicated that a spell of more settled weather could be on the way shortly as temperatures hit record highs in Europe.
One of the worst heatwaves seen in some EU nations in decades h… [+3399 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: In heat emergency, southern Europe scrambles for resources - New York Post
articles.description: A heat wave in southeast Europe has fueled wildfires in Turkey and threatened the national power grid in Greece as governments scrambled to secure the resources to cope with the emergency.
articles.content: ATHENS, Greece A heat wave baking southeast Europe has fueled deadly wildfires in Turkey and threatened the national power grid in Greece as governments scrambled Monday to secure the resources neede… [+4137 chars]
